context.p: On the View customer page, you can see the organization data that is currently defined for your customers.
The following information on a customer organization is available:

ul.li: Email address for general communication with the organization.
Country where the organization is located.

context.p: To view the organization data of a customer:

step.cmd: From the Organization ID list, select the customer for which to view the data.

info.p: The list shows the customers that have subscribed to one of your services and the customers you have registered, irrespective of whether they have subscribed to a service.
If you are logged in as a supplier, the list also shows your brokers' customers who have subscribed to one of your services offered by a broker.
The organization IDs of the customers are appended to the names of the organizations.

result.p: The organization data is instantly displayed.
